title.rendered: Amb. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Mr. Laurent De Boeck.

content.rendered: The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Amb. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Mr. Laurent De Boeck, International Organisation for Migration (IOM) Chief of Mission to Nigeria today 30th July, 2024. Mr. Laurent was at Tafawa Balewa House to officially bid farewell to the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, following the end of his Tour of Duty.
